cards.title: Perplexity’s new Computer agent will run other agents for you
tldr: **Perplexity introduces a new Computer agent that can manage other agents autonomously.**
The agent is designed to streamline workflows by coordinating multiple AI agents.
This tool could assist with project management tasks by automating agent interactions.

cards.title: How the rise of AI-native software could give SMBs enterprise-level power
tldr: AI-native software empowers SMBs with tools previously available only to enterprises.
These solutions leverage AI to streamline operations and enhance decision-making.
The rise of AI-native software could level the playing field for small businesses.

cards.title: IBM integrates Deepgram voice AI into watsonx Orchestrate platform
tldr: **IBM has integrated Deepgram voice AI into its watsonx Orchestrate platform.**
This integration enhances automation capabilities through natural language processing and voice commands.
The platform could enable voice-driven automation for project workflows, task management, and reporting within PMOs.

cards.title: Read AI launches an email-based ‘digital twin’ to help you with schedules and answers
tldr: **Read AI introduces an email-based ‘digital twin’ designed to manage schedules and answer questions.**
This AI assistant integrates with email to autonomously handle meeting coordination and information retrieval.
The tool aims to reduce administrative burden by automating routine communication for professionals.

cards.title: Trace raises $3M to solve the AI agent adoption problem in enterprise
tldr: **Trace secured $3M funding to tackle the significant challenge of AI agent adoption in enterprise.**
The company aims to streamline the integration and utilization of AI agents within complex business operations.
This initiative could assist organizations in successfully deploying new AI technologies and managing their impact.

cards.title: CORPGEN advances AI agents for real work
tldr: **Microsoft's CORPGEN initiative is advancing AI agents for practical, real-world applications.**
The research focuses on enabling AI agents to perform more complex and meaningful tasks.
This development could assist with enhancing automation and operational efficiency across various functions.

cards.title: I built an OpenClaw AI agent to do my job for me. The results were surprising—and a little scary
tldr: **An author built an OpenClaw AI agent to automate his job of writing Fast Company articles.**
The AI agent's performance in generating compelling stories yielded surprising and somewhat scary results.
This experiment explores AI's potential for automating creative tasks and its implications for future workforces.

cards.title: ServiceNow debuts Autonomous Workforce, EmployeeWorks automation tools
tldr: **ServiceNow launched Autonomous Workforce and EmployeeWorks automation platforms.**
These new tools aim to enhance productivity and streamline operations for employees.
The platforms could help automate routine tasks, impacting resource management and project efficiency.

cards.title: Microsoft’s Copilot Tasks AI uses its own computer to get things done
tldr: **Microsoft's Copilot Tasks AI autonomously executes actions on its own computer.**
This AI aims to 'get things done' by interacting directly with the system.
Its capability for self-directed task completion is relevant to process automation.

cards.title: Anthropic buys Vercept, deepening push into AI task automation
tldr: **Anthropic acquired Vercept to enhance its capabilities in AI-driven task automation.**
This acquisition signifies Anthropic's strategic expansion into automated workflow solutions.
The move aims to deepen AI's role in automating complex tasks, relevant to operational efficiency.

cards.title: ServiceNow Launches Autonomous Workforce
tldr: **ServiceNow has launched an 'Autonomous Workforce' solution, as reported by AI Business.**
The article indicates this solution is positioned within the field of agentic AI for business.
This development could assist organizations in automating various tasks and improving operational efficiency.

cards.title: ServiceNow integrates Moveworks, launches Autonomous Workforce, EmployeeWorks
tldr: **ServiceNow integrates Moveworks AI, launching Autonomous Workforce and EmployeeWorks platforms.**
The integration enhances employee support, automating IT and HR requests with conversational AI.
Aims to boost operational efficiency and employee experience, which could assist project team productivity.

cards.title: How I Turned Tiago Forte's PARA Method Into an AI-Powered Productivity OS With Claude Code + Obsidian
tldr: **The article details building an AI-powered productivity OS by adapting Tiago Forte's PARA method with Claude Code and Obsidian.**
This system integrates 5 commands, 6 folders, and an AI Copilot to streamline weekly task management and decision-making.
It aims to reduce time spent cross-referencing multiple tools, providing clarity on what truly matters each week.

cards.title: RingCentral: Agentic AI is happening now and it’s adding value
tldr: **RingCentral's Agentic AI is currently enhancing value in enterprise communications.**
The AI technology focuses on improving customer engagement and operational efficiency.
This development could assist with project management by streamlining communication processes.

cards.title: Salesforce's Agentic Work Unit: What you need to know
tldr: **Salesforce introduces the concept of an 'Agentic Work Unit' for autonomous task execution within enterprises.**
These AI-powered units are designed to automate complex workflows and decision-making processes.
The technology could assist organizations in streamlining operations and improving efficiency across various functions.

cards.title: From agent sprawl to seamless alignment: Introducing agents in Jira
tldr: **Atlassian introduces AI agents directly within Jira to enhance project management.**
These agents aim to transform 'agent sprawl' into 'seamless alignment' across workflows.
The integration seeks to automate tasks and improve coordination for project delivery teams.

cards.title: Jira’s latest update allows AI agents and humans to work side by side
tldr: **Jira's latest update introduces AI agents designed to work collaboratively alongside human users.**
The new functionality allows AI agents and humans to operate "side by side" within the project management platform.
This integration aims to enhance task execution and streamline workflows within project environments.

cards.title: Atlassian embeds agents into Jira and embraces MCP for third-party integrations
tldr: **Atlassian integrates AI agents directly into Jira to automate tasks and enhance project workflows.**
The company is also adopting a Multi-Cloud Platform (MCP) strategy for seamless third-party integrations.
These advancements aim to streamline project delivery, improve collaboration, and boost overall team efficiency within Jira.

cards.title: Rovo at Work: AI agents in action
tldr: **Rovo AI agents enhance workplace productivity through automation and intelligent assistance.**
These AI agents can streamline workflows and reduce manual tasks for teams.
Potential applications include automating repetitive tasks and improving team collaboration.

cards.title: Anthropic targets core business systems with new Claude plug-ins
tldr: **Anthropic introduces new Claude plug-ins designed for integration with core business systems.**
These plug-ins aim to enhance functionality and streamline operations within enterprise environments.
The integration of AI into business systems could assist with various project and operational workflows.
